33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Alqamah bin Wa'il bin Hujr narrated from his father:"I heard the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) while a man was asking him: 'What do you see that we should do if there are leaders over us who deny our rights, while they seek their rights?' So the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said: 'Listen and obey, for only they are responsible for their burdens, and only you are responsible for your burdens

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ سَتَكُونُ فِتَنٌ كَقِطَعِ اللَّيْلِ الْمُظْلِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About 'There Will Be A Fitnah Like A Portion Of The Dark Night'
